name: se.zifro.ui
description:
Generic UI used in all Zifro Playground games.

Provides IDE-like code window with syntax highlighting and small library of shortcuts.

Requires the Zifro Mellis Compiler.
Add as dependency to your Packages/manifest.json:

"se.zifro.mellis": "https://github.com/zardan/compiler.git#upm",
